remarks: Relate a limit on the metric space of complex numbers to our complex number limit notation.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Dec-2006.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-May-2014.)
statement:
lmclim.2 $e |- J = ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) $.
lmclim.3 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
lmclim $p |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ Z C_ dom F ) -> ( F ( ~~>t ` J ) P <-> ( F e. ( CC ^pm CC ) /\ F ~~> P ) ) ) $.
